name: djunct_4d_imager
author: PA Taylor (NIMH, NIH, USA)
description: The program is useful for viewing the same slice across the 'time' dimension of a 4D data set.

inputs.description: Specify type of movie file. Options: MPEG, AGIF
inputs.name: Movie Type

output-files.description: Output montage image with constant brightness range
output-files.name: Onescale PNG Image

output-files.description: Output montage image with varying brightness range
output-files.name: Sepscale PNG Image

output-files.description: Output movie with constant brightness range (one slice at a time)
output-files.name: Onescale MPEG Movie

output-files.description: Output movie with varying brightness range (one slice at a time)
output-files.name: Sepscale MPEG Movie

output-files.description: Output animated GIF with constant brightness range (one slice at a time)
output-files.name: Onescale AGIF

output-files.description: Output animated GIF with varying brightness range (one slice at a time)
output-files.name: Sepscale AGIF
